keyMoments.title: Red Hair Pirates Arrive at Marineford
keyMoments.description: The entire Red Hair Pirates crew arrives at Marineford, with Shanks leading them to end the war.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full strength and influence of one of the Four Emperors' crews, as their arrival alone is enough to end the Marineford War.

keyMoments.title: Senior Officers Make First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Several previously unseen senior officers of the Red Hair Pirates are shown for the first time, including Monster, Hongo, and Gab.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals more of the crew composition and establishes the Red Hair Pirates as a well-organized and powerful force.

jollyRoger: A skull with red hair and two crossed swords behind it

keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Escape Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates successfully navigate their submarine away from Marineford with Luffy and Jinbe aboard, evading attacks from Marine Admirals.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's escape ensures Luffy's survival and establishes Law as an important ally.

jollyRoger: A skull with a virus-like pattern
